data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Papáč, Vladimír, Kováč, Ľubomír (2013): Four new troglobiotic species of the genus Megalothorax Willem, 1900 (Collembola: Neelipleona) from the Carpathian Mountains (Slovakia, Romania). Zootaxa 3737 (5): 545-575, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3737.5.3
